title: All Tomorrows creator C. M. Kösemen
description:
All Tomorrows video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=imNtSPM3-r4

C. M. Kösemen's art: http://cmkosemen.com/art.html

C. M. Kösemen's books: http://cmkosemen.com/books.html

CuriosityStream and Nebula for $15/year: https://curiositystream.com/asxpod

Alt Shift X Podcast YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_1DUeMbesM8

Alt Shift X Podcast Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/show/77vubQGd6CsuespWT2Wqa0

Twitter: https://twitter.com/AltShiftX

0:00 Intro

3:04 Common themes

5:49 All Yesterdays

9:07 All Tomorrows

14:20 Online lore, worldbuilding

16:32 All Tomorrows

21:31 Turkey, history

32:08 Fiction and science

36:00 Fact is stranger than fiction story

42:02 Cryptozoologicon

45:16 All Yesterdays

49:56 Art and interpretation

1:04:42 Snaiad

1:10:17 Netflix dreams

1:14:39 Favourite worlds

1:20:00 Inspiration

And for the record – Tolkien apparently never said “a mythology for England”

Special thanks to Patrons Cameron Weiss, Michael Appell, Ryan Steele, Triangle Wine Company, Harry, Shane Veglia, Brian Sentient, Ria McDoodle, Tim Cunniff, NotGac, Cara Akame, Ilhuilkamina Urdiana, SirRusty.
